meaningMnemonic: Something is <kanji>dangl</kanji>ing in front of you, so you <kanji>fix</kanji> it so it's straight and not moving. It becomes perfectly <vocabulary>vertical</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>perpendicular</vocabulary> to the floor.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
